text: Andrew Dice Clay (born September 29, 1957) is an American comedian and actor. He performs stand-up comedy. He has acted in many comedy and drama movies, including Pretty in Pink and It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia. Clay was born in Brooklyn, New York with the name Andrew Silverstein. ==References== Category:American movie actors Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:1957 births Category:Living people
title: Andrew Dice Clay
